data.title: Food is good
data.text: The breakfast here is very good I have never had dinner at this location. I have tried several meals from there breakfast menu and it was all very good. I did not give it a 5 star because of price. It's a little on the pricey side for this type of restaurant.

data.title: Yummy food!
data.text: Been a resident of Mt. Vernon for years but never had Matrix before. Well, I've been back several times!  Delicious Jamaican food at a decent price. The large meal is huge and can easily feed 2-3 people!  Their jerk chicken is awesome!
